title: O paradEvi pAvanI
sahitya:
O paradEvi pAvanI vINApANi vidhirANi vANi


anupallavi

  ApAda madhuram IyavammA AlOcanAmrtam IyavammA


caraNam    vInula vinduka vINiya mITi tAna rAga laya DhAyama nETi 
gAnara hasyamu lerigina muraLIgAna mOhinI shrI sarasvati
okka navvE (bhAvgIt).  No raga given.  k/cApu tALA.  
okka navvE cAlu cAladani pincuTaku okka cUpE cAlu cAladani pincuTaku
okka sparshE cAlu cAladani pincuTaku okka nuvvE cAlu I bratuku manugaDaku
